greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest multiple of n using only digits 0 and 9.
comment: a(n) = min{A097256(k): k > 0 and A097256(k) mod n = 0}. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 10 2012]
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: a078248 n = head [x | x <- tail a097256_list, mod x n == 0]
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 23 2002
